MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas, affecting properties in Shay Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:46am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:03am on 12th April 2021.
